description:
Gardenia Petale Eau de Parfum - A Floral Symphony of Elegance

Experience the captivating allure of Gardenia Petale EDP, a luxurious fragrance that embodies the essence of pure white gardenia blossoms in full bloom. This bestselling floral fragrance captures the delicate beauty and intoxicating scent of fresh gardenias, creating an aroma that's both sophisticated and timelessly feminine. âœ¨

Product Information

Size 75ml
Gender Women
Product Type Eau de Parfum
Concentration EDP
Brand Van Cleef & Arpels

The Fragrance Journey of Gardenia Petale

Top Notes Gardenia, Green Notes, Bergamot ðŸŒ¿
Heart Notes Jasmine, Lily of the Valley, Rose ðŸŒ¸
Base Notes Musk, Sandalwood, Vanilla ðŸ’«

Key Features of Gardenia Petale EDP

  • Exquisite white floral fragrance centered around gardenia
  • Long-lasting wear with moderate sillage ðŸ’Ž
  • Elegant bottle design reflecting the luxury of the scent
  • Perfect for day and evening wear
  • Part of Van Cleef & Arpels' exclusive Collection Extraordinaire

This elegant perfume begins with the intoxicating freshness of gardenia petals, enhanced by crisp green notes and zesty bergamot. As it evolves, the heart reveals a bouquet of jasmine, delicate lily of the valley, and rose, creating a truly feminine core. The dry down leaves a sensual trail of musk, warm sandalwood, and creamy vanilla that lingers beautifully on the skin. ðŸ”¥

The Heritage Behind the Fragrance

Gardenia Petale is part of Van Cleef & Arpels' prestigious Collection Extraordinaire, launched to celebrate the art of fine perfumery. This collection represents the perfect marriage between the brand's jewelry expertise and the world of luxury fragrances. Each scent, including the magnificent Gardenia Petale, is crafted with the same attention to detail and excellence as their fine jewelry pieces.

This newly arrived fragrance celebrates the gardenia flower - a symbol of purity, elegance, and secret love in many cultures. The perfumer has masterfully captured the essence of fresh gardenia blossoms, creating a scent that's both authentic and refined.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Gardenia Petale EDP last on the skin?
Gardenia Petale offers impressive longevity of 6-8 hours on most skin types. The white floral notes remain prominent throughout the wear, while the base notes of musk and sandalwood create a beautiful foundation that extends the fragrance's presence. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and layer with unscented lotion to help the fragrance adhere to your skin better. âœ¨
